resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104060</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104060</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205824</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Quilts and Quiltmaking in America, 1978-1996</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Steppdecken und Quiltmaking in Amerika, 1978-1996</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Édredons et Quiltmaking en Amérique, 1978-1996</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Quilts e Quiltmaking em América, 1978-1996</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Trapunte e Quiltmaking in America, 1978-1996</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παπλώματα και Quiltmaking στην Αμερική, 1978-1996</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Edredones y Quiltmaking en América, 1978-1996</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">showcases materials from two American Folklife Centercollections, the Blue Ridge Parkway Folklife Project Collection (1978) and the All-American Quilt Contest sponsored by Coming Home, a division of Lands' End, and Good Housekeeping. Together, these collections provide a glimpse into America's diverse quilting traditions. Photographs and recorded interviews with quiltmakers are also available.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">stellt Materialien von zwei Amerikaner Folklife 
Centercollections, das blaue Kante-Allee Folklife Projekt Collection 
(1978) und der All-Amerikanische Steppdecke-Wettbewerb, der gefördert
werden zur Schau, indem nach Hause kommen, eine, Abteilung des Endes 
der Länder und gute Haushaltung. Zusammen stellen diese 
Ansammlungen einen Blick in Amerikas verschiedene quilting Traditionen
zur Verfügung. Fotographien und gespeicherte Interviews mit 
quiltmakers sind auch vorhanden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">présente des matériaux deux de l'Américain 
Folklife Centercollections, le projet bleu Collection (1978) de 
Folklife de route express d'arête et le concours Tout-Américain de 
édredon commandité en venant à la maison, une division de 
l'extrémité des terres, et bon ménage. Ensemble, ces 
collections fournissent un aperçu dans les traditions piquantes 
diverses de l'Amérique. Les photographies et les entrevues 
enregistrées avec des quiltmakers sont également disponibles.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">showcases materiais dois do americano Folklife 
Centercollections, o projeto azul Coleção de Folklife do parkway do 
cume (1978) e a competição Todo-Americana do quilt patrocinada vindo
para casa, uma divisão da extremidade das terras, e tarefas 
domésticas boas. Junto, estas coleções fornecem um glimpse em
tradições quilting diversas de América. As fotografias e as 
entrevistas gravadas com quiltmakers estão também disponíveis.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">montra i materiali due dall'americano 
Folklife Centercollections, il progetto blu Collection (1978) Folklife
del parkway della cresta ed il concorso Tutto-Americano della trapunta
promosso dal venire a casa, una divisione dell'estremità delle terre 
ed il buon governo della casa. Insieme, queste collezioni 
forniscono un glimpse nelle tradizioni quilting varie dell'America. 
Le fotografie e le interviste registrate con i quiltmakers sono 
egualmente disponibili.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">επιδεικνύει τα υλικά από δύο αμερικανικό Folklife 
Centercollections, την μπλε συλλογή προγράμματος Folklife 
χώρων στάθμευσης κορυφογραμμών (1978) και τον όλος-αμερικανικό
διαγωνισμό παπλωμάτων που υποστηρίζονται με να έρθει κατ' οίκον, 
ένα τμήμα του τέλους των εδαφών, και την καλή οικοκυρική. 
Μαζί, αυτές οι συλλογές παρέχουν μια αναλαμπή στις 
διαφορετικές να γεμίσουν της Αμερικής παραδόσεις. Οι 
φωτογραφίες και οι καταγραμμένες συνεντεύξεις με τα quiltmakers 
είναι επίσης διαθέσιμες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">showcases los materiales a partir el dos del 
americano Folklife Centercollections, el proyecto azul Collection 
(1978) de Folklife del parkway del canto y la competencia 
Todo-Americana del edredón patrocinada viniendo a casa, una división
del extremo de las pistas, y buenas operacíones de entretenimiento. 
Junto, estas colecciones proporcionan a una ojeada en las 
tradiciones que acolchan diversas de América. Las fotografías 
y las entrevistas registradas con quiltmakers están también 
disponibles.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205824</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104060</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/quilts-and-quiltmaking-in-america-1978-1996</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
